portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio built using React and styled with SCSS, drawing inspiration from the stunning portfolio designed by Jacek Jeznach. This project showcases my skills, experiences, and projects in a visually appealing and interactive manner.

portfolio.title: MixMatch
portfolio.description: MixMatch is a music-based social networking application that allows users to see what their friends are listening to and get song recommendations based on popular music within a user's network.

portfolio.title: Contagion Simulation
portfolio.description: This exercise is inspired by the Washington Post's article that simulated infectiousness with 2D cells in a graphical visualization.
